text: int main ( ) { int n , i , j , k , lines , temp ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int Ans [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & lines ) ; int * * Arr = ( int * * ) malloc ( sizeof ( int * ) * lines ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < lines ; j ++ ) { * ( Arr + j ) = ( int * ) malloc ( sizeof ( int ) * ( j + 1 ) ) ; } for ( j = 0 ; j < lines ; j ++ ) { for ( k = 0 ; k < ( j + 1 ) ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , ( * ( Arr + j ) + k ) ) ; } } for ( j = lines - 1 ; j > 0 ; j -- ) { for ( k = 0 ; k < j ; k ++ ) { if ( ( * ( * ( Arr + j ) + k ) ) < ( * ( * ( Arr + j ) + k + 1 ) ) ) temp = ( * ( * ( Arr + j ) + k + 1 ) ) ; else temp = ( * ( * ( Arr + j ) + k ) ) ; ( * ( * ( Arr + j - 1 ) + k ) ) += temp ; } } Ans [ i ] = * * Arr ; free ( Arr ) ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { printf ( "%d\n" , Ans [ i ] ) ; } return 0 ; }

for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & lines ) ; int * * Arr = ( int * * ) malloc ( sizeof ( int * ) * lines ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < lines ; j ++ ) { * ( Arr + j ) = ( int * ) malloc ( sizeof ( int ) * ( j + 1 ) ) ; } for ( j = 0 ; j < lines ; j ++ ) { for ( k = 0 ; k < ( j + 1 ) ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , ( * ( Arr + j ) + k ) ) ; } } for ( j = lines - 1 ; j > 0 ; j -- ) { for ( k = 0 ; k < j ; k ++ ) { if ( ( * ( * ( Arr + j ) + k ) ) < ( * ( * ( Arr + j ) + k + 1 ) ) ) temp = ( * ( * ( Arr + j ) + k + 1 ) ) ; else temp = ( * ( * ( Arr + j ) + k ) ) ; ( * ( * ( Arr + j - 1 ) + k ) ) += temp ; } } Ans [ i ] = * * Arr ; free ( Arr ) ; }
